alert.note: Alert for Northern Oneida (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 09 at 10:22PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT NORTHERN ONEIDA COUNTY THROUGH 1045 PM EDT... At 1022 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles southeast of Pulaski to Boonville to near Northwood. Movement was north at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Boonville, Forestport, Steuben, Florence, Ava, Remsen, Alder Creek, Hinckley, Hawkinsville, and Glenmore. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
